document.full_text: pakistan's intelligence chief has reportedly asked the united states to stop its drone strikes in the country, a newspaper reported on sunday, touching on an issue that has become more sensitive since the killing of osama bin laden strained ties.
document.title: pakistan spy chief asks u.s. to end drone strikes: report
lines_and_colors: pakistan's intelligence chief has reportedly asked the united states to stop its drone strikes in the country, a newspaper reported on sunday, touching on an issue that has become more sensitive since the killing of osama bin laden strained ties.
